name: Free World BMX
description:
Best BMX experience with simple operation.
Jump about in the various world.

Features
- SCORE ATTACK MODE: link tricks and aim for a high score
- FREE RIDE MODE: no rules, no time limits
- EVENT: daily challenge.
- Tweak your parameters with a wide range of gear and items (speed, height, rotations)

Riding Scores
The app assigns detailed scores to your tricks based on how cool they are. It evaluates your height in the air, speed, number of spins, and number of combinations as the basic criteria, and then takes into account your landing skills, use of the park, and level of difficult of the tricks.

Note:
Game may not function as intended on some devices.
Does not support data synching or restoring.
